name: LogRhythm SIEM
description: This app supports ingestion and several investigative actions on LogRhythm SIEM

poll_now_ingestion_span.description: Poll last n days for 'Poll Now'

first_scheduled_ingestion_span.description: Poll last n days for first scheduled polling

max_alarms.description: Maximum number of alarms to ingest for scheduled polling

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

actions.verbose: Due to a limitation in the LogRhythm API, this action only supports adding to General, User, and Host lists. To add to a Host list. Specify the type of host to add, either Hostname, IP, or IP Range.

The query_dict parameter takes a JSON dictionary with each key representing a field in an event to query. The possible keys for this dictionary are:

FieldType
IDMGroupForLogininteger
ImpactedIPip
Severitystring
ImpactedMACstring
BytesInquantity
Directioninteger
Objectstring
PIDinteger
Hoststring
ImpactedPortRangeport_range
NATIPRangeip_range
VendorMsgIDstring
Accountstring
Senderstring
URLstring
PortRangeport_range
Addressstring
Amountquantity
MsgSourceHostinteger
ImpactedEntityinteger
OriginNetworkinteger
Protocolinteger
ObjectNamestring
ImpactedNATPortRangeport_range
MPERuleinteger
Entityinteger
MACstring
IPRangeip_range
Subjectstring
ImpactedNATPortinteger
Networkinteger
OriginNATIPRangeip_range
Priorityquantity
Applicationstring
Versionstring
Locationinteger
BytesInOutquantity
CommonEventinteger
OriginNATPortinteger
ItemsInquantity
Interfacestring
ItemsInOutquantity
Commandstring
ImpactedLocationinteger
Domainstring
IDMGroupForAccountinteger
NATPortRangeport_range
Messagestring
Groupstring
OriginPortinteger
OriginEntityinteger
ImpactedNATIPRangeip_range
OriginIPRangeip_range
ImpactedPortinteger
IDMGroupForUserinteger
OriginZoneinteger
KnownServiceinteger
Userstring
Recipientstring
KnownOriginHostinteger
OriginEntityOrImpactedEntityinteger
ImpactedHostNamestring
Quantityquantity
Classificationinteger
Processstring
ImpactedNATIPip
KnownHostinteger
ImpactedHoststring
NATIPip
Sizequantity
OriginHostNamestring
OriginNATPortRangeport_range
OriginInterfacestring
OriginNATIPip
BytesOutquantity
HostNamestring
MsgSourceinteger
Sessionstring
ImpactedInterfacestring
OriginMACstring
ImpactedIPRangeip_range
IPip
NATPortinteger
KnownImpactedHostinteger
Loginstring
OriginZoneOrImpactedZoneinteger
ItemsOutquantity
MsgSourceTypeinteger
OriginLocationinteger
ImpactedNetworkinteger
OriginIPip
OriginHoststring
ImpactedZoneinteger
OriginPortRangeport_range
Ratequantity
Durationquantity
Portinteger


See the LogQueryFilterTypeEnum section of the LogRhythm® SOAP API Reference Guide for more information on these fields.

Fields listed with the type quantity should be given as single integers or as a range of integers. For example, a query_dict of
{"Priority": 16}
would query for events with a priority of 16. While a query_dict of 
{"Priority": 10-20}
would query for events with priorities from 10 to 20 (inclusive).

Fields with a type of ip_range should be given in the form "1.1.1.0-1.1.1.1"

Fields with a type of port_range should be given in the form "80-443"

example_values: <Event xmlns='http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events/event'><System><Provider Name='LogRhythm Job Manager'/><EventID Qualifiers='0'>6001</EventID><Level>Information</Level><Task>None</Task><Keywords>Classic</Keywords><TimeCreated SystemTime='2017-07-27T20:12:48.000000000Z'/><EventRecordID>260983</EventRecordID><Channel>Application</Channel><Computer>logr-siem-01.lab.phantom.local</Computer><Security/></System><EventData>[AD Sync] Active Directory synchronization started.</EventData></Event>

container_count.description: Maximum number of container records to query for
